description: Get details of available tunnel endpoint maintenance.

parameters.name: VpnConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the Site-to-Site VPN connection.

parameters.description: The external IP address of the VPN tunnel.

nested_items.name: VpnConnectionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Site-to-Site VPN connection.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the transit gateway associated with the VPN connection.

nested_items.description: The ID of the customer gateway.

nested_items.name: VpnGatewayId
nested_items.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway.

nested_items.description: The external IP address of the VPN tunnel.

nested_items.description: Get details of pending tunnel endpoint maintenance.

nested_items.description: Verify existence of a pending maintenance.

nested_items.description: The timestamp after which Amazon Web Services will automatically apply maintenance.
